content.raw:
I just read post on https://community.subtchallenge.com/t/cell-phone-enabled-wifi-ap/803 that is related to the real world April STIX:
"""
The cell phone will be running in "Hotspot" mode and thus the WIFI radio will be operating as an access point. Each cell phone artifact will broadcast its SSID over WIFI, which will be in the form of "PhoneArtifactXX" where XX will be a two-digit randomized number. The cell phone access point will employ WPS encryption and will not accept connections from team platforms.
"""

Is there something similar available in Virtual Track?

Each cell phone artifact will broadcast its SSID over WIFI, which will be in the form of "PhoneArtifactXX" where XX will be a two-digit randomized number. The cell phone access point will employ WPS encryption and will not accept connections from team platforms. """
